title: Garlic & Rosemary Pizza Dough with Thermomix
directions: 1. Place the garlic and rosemary into the TM bowl. Mix for 5 seconds on speed 7 until finely chopped.
2. Add the water, yeast, oil and salt. Mix for 5 seconds on speed 3 to combine.
3. Add the flour. Mix for 6 seconds on speed 8 to combine.
4. Set dial to closed lid position. Knead dough for 2 minutes on interval speed.
5. Transfer the dough to the TM silicone mat. Knead the dough into a ball and fold over mat to cover. Stand for about 30 minutes or until the dough has doubled in size.
6. Open up mat and punch down dough. Using a large knife, cut dough into 3 portions .
ingredients: Garlic & Rosemary Pizza Dough with Thermomix
500g Lighthouse Bread & Pizza Flour (strong bakers flour)
